mapper.update: update t_village set village_code = #{villageCode}, village_name = #{villageName}, village_introduce = #{villageIntroduce}, image_code = #{imageCode}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, update_time = now(), update_name = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where village_code = #{villageCode} and version = #{version}
